en: The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth; and not I only, but also all they that know the truth;
hmr: Upa chun: Nuhmei ṭha thlang le a nauhai kuomah: Titakzetin ka hmangai cheu a nih, kei chau ni loin, thutak chu hre taphawt khawmin an hmangai cheu a nih:

en: for the truth’s sake which abideth in us, and it shall be with us for ever:
hmr: Thutak einia um zing, kumkhuo khawma ei kuoma um ding lei hin.

en: Grace, mercy, peace shall be with us, from God the Father, and from Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
hmr: Pa Pathien le Pa Naupa Isu Krista kuoma inthawkin, lunginsiet- na dâm, zângaina dâm, inremna dâm chu, thutak le hmangainain ei kuomah um a tih.

en: I rejoice greatly that I have found certain of thy children walking in truth, even as we received commandment from the Father.
hmr: Pa kuoma inthawka thupêk ei hmu ang khan i nau tuhai amanih thutaka umin ka hmu leiin ka lâwm hle a nih.

en: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote to thee a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.
hmr: Nuhmei ṭha, i kuoma thupêk thar ziek ang ni loin, a tîra inthawka ei nei ang kha ziek lemin, ei inhma- ngai tuona dingin ka ngên che a nih.

en: And this is love, that we should walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, even as ye heard from the beginning, that ye should walk in it.
hmr: Chun, hi hi hmangaina a nih, ama thupêk ang peia ei um hi. Thupêk a tîra inthawka in ihriet ang chu hi hi a nih, hmangainaa chun um ro, ti hi.

en: For many deceivers are gone forth into the world, even they that confess not that Jesus Christ cometh in the flesh. This is the deceiver and the antichrist.
hmr: Hlêmtu tamtak — Isu Krista chu tisain a hung ti ṭan nawtuhai kha — khawvêla hin an hung suok ta sih a. Chuong ang mi chu an nih, hlêmtu le Krista kaltu chu.

en: Look to yourselves, that ye lose not the things which we have wrought, but that ye receive a full reward.
hmr: Ei thaw suok sahai kha in inhmang nawh a, a man chu a kima in hmu thei lemna dingin invêng ṭha ro.

en: Whosoever goeth onward and abideth not in the teaching of Christ, hath not God: he that abideth in the teaching, the same hath both the Father and the Son.
hmr: Tûkhawm Krista inchûktirna thua um zing loa, khûm chun Pathien a nei nawh. Chu inchûktirna thua um zing ruok chun, ama ngei chun Pa le Naupa a nei kawp a nih.

en: If any one cometh unto you, and bringeth not this teaching, receive him not into your house, and give him no greeting:
hmr: Tûkhawm, chu inchûktirna thu chu hung chawi loin, in kuomah hung sienla, in inah intlungtir naw unla, ṭawngbau ṭha khawmin inthla naw ro;

en: for he that giveth him greeting partaketh in his evil works.
hmr: ṭawngbau ṭhaa inthlatu chu a thil suksuola chun a ṭhang ve sih a.

en: Having many things to write unto you, I would not write them with paper and ink: but I hope to come unto you, and to speak face to face, that your joy may be made full.
hmr: In kuomah thu tamtak hril ding ka nei leiin lekha le lekhatuiin ziek ka nuom nawh; in lâwm a kim theina dingin, in kuoma hunga, inhmatuoa inbiek ka beisei lem a nih.

en: The children of thine elect sister salute thee.
hmr: I zuorpuinu thlang nauhaiin chibai an bûk che.
